title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli (salty-flower/ollama-cli)
summary: Cross-platform TUI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: Proxy that lets GitHub Copilot use an Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java-client)
summary: Community Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host a Discord bot backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm (ollama-helm/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers threads using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama4dotnet/ollama-csharp)
summary: Community C# / .NET client for Ollama (NuGet: OllamaSharp).

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama inside notes.

title: ollama-rust (ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go (ollama4go/ollama-go)
summary: Community Go client for Ollama (go get github.com/ollama4go/ollama-go).

title: ollama-vscode (ollama-vscode/ollama-vscode)
summary: VS Code extension that adds a chat sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (impira/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama + Chroma for private RAG.
